Comprehensive Commercial Roofing Services When it comes to your commercial roofing needs, no one has more experience and know-how than the commercial roofing contractors in Topeka, KS here at Midwest Coating, Inc. We have been serving businesses throughout Topeka and NE Kansas area since 1979. We value the relationships we've developed with our customers throughout our company's history, and are committed to quality roofing solutions at a fair price. Let us be your first call for your commercial roofing needs. We offer free estimates, free roof inspections, and have multiple roofing methods at our disposal for any commercial roofing need. Midwest Coating is a family owned and locally operated business. We own our equipment and are up to date on the latest roofing methods. We take safety and customer satisfaction very seriously and treat each roof like it is our own. We are premier commercial roofing contractors in Lawrence, KS and nearby areas and have an A+ rating from the Better Business Bureau. Don't hesitate to call us today! Roof Replacement For big or small projects, Midwest Coating Inc can handle all your roof replacement projects. We do full tear-offs, metal retrofits, and more for your commercial property. Learn More Service and Repair With our full-service roofing repair department, we can handle your roof emergencies promptly. We repair all types of commercial roofs, from shingles to complex systems. Learn More New Construction Our trained and experienced professionals have handled many new commercial construction projects. We make sure your new roof is done right the first time. Providing You With Quality Roofing Services Midwest Coating Inc. has an on-call roof leak service/repair department. Trust our service team to repair any type of roofing system. From shingles to single-ply, modified, metal and coated commercial roofing systems, we've got solutions for all types of roof repair needs. If you prefer not to spend money on a brand-new roof, we can assess the roof and repair only what is needed to get your roof watertight. Count on our experts to flash in new roof penetrations and work with HVAC contractors on your building for any type of roof systems. Call us today for a free estimate on our roof repair services! Long-Lasting Duro-Last Roofing Systems Duro-Last is a high-quality PVC product with prefabricated deck sheets, parapet walls, and roof penetration details. This makes it installer-friendly with fewer seams on your roof. It can work in any type of commercial roofing situation. Call us for a free estimate today — ask about our warranties! Duro-Last offers 15-30 year warranties and also offers consequential damages with selected warranties. Midwest Coating Inc. has been installing this product since 1982 and is a Duro-Last Roofing Platinum Contractor. Midwest Coating Inc. Oops, there was an error sending your message.Please try again later. Learn More About Our History Midwest Coating Inc. was established in 1979 by Don Morris. We got our name from handling roof coatings in the beginning. In 1982 we decided to advance our capabilities and became a certified installer of the superior Duro-Last roofing system. We decided to open up our product line again in 2010 when we started carrying Johns Manville and Mule-Hide PVCs, TPOs, and EPDMs. We are also certified to install ER Systems products which enable our service and repair crews to repair and restore additional roofing systems. We continually add up-to-date equipment, specially trained personnel, and support staff to provide the quality services you deserve.Call us at (785) 262-5147 for a free estimate.
